name: Addict
description: You have a specific vice you cannot deny. If you can’t get your fix, you risk attrition.

name: Ascetic
description: You frown on possessions. Never exceed 5 equipment.

name: Ancient
description: You are old! Physical skills max at 9, but you gain respect.

name: Bad Reputation
description: You've done terrible things and people know.

name: Crazy
description: You choose randomly when faced with hard choices.

name: Disorganized
description: Roll 9 or less to find gear except your most-used items.

name: Drunkard
description: Beer drains your coin and irritates friends.

name: Employed
description: You are oathsworn. Disobey orders at your peril.

name: Greedy
description: Roll 6 or less to resist grabbing treasure.

name: Grudge
description: You act irrationally when encountering a target of your bias.

name: Impetuous
description: You can only act in phase 1 or 2.

name: Injured
description: You lose -1 max skill slot.

name: Just a Kid
description: You may never have more than 6 skills.

name: Paranoid
description: You sow distrust and NPCs rarely trust you.

name: Phobia
description: When facing the source of your fear, no rolls succeed.

name: Pursued
description: You are hunted by an enemy or nemesis.

name: Sickly
description: Resist and Survival max at 9.

name: Stubborn
description: Once your mind is made, only a D20 contest changes it.

name: Timid
description: You may only act in phase 4 or 5.

name: Unlucky
description: Critically fail on a 16+.
